family.name: Tsunami SoundCar
family.comment: These are the -retail- version Tsunami SoundCar decoders

model.comment:
Tsunami SoundCar Digital Sound Decoder
Early SW version 1.01 (2014-2016) without livestock support.
Check CV105 firmware version.

Tsunami SoundCar Digital Sound Decoder
Early SW version 1.01 (2014-2016) without livestock support.
Check CV105 firmware version.

Tsunami SoundCar Digital Sound Decoder
SW version 1.03 (2017) with livestock support
and additional airhorns and bells.
Check CV105 firmware version.

variable.tooltip: Sets the acceleration rate (delay). Higher number = slower rate
variable.label: Acceleration Rate (0-255)
Accellerazione (0-255)
Accelération (0-255)
Anfahrverzögerung (0-255)

variable.tooltip: Sets the deceleration rate (delay). Higher number = slower rate
variable.label: Braking Rate (0-255)
Decellerazione (1-255)
Décélération (1-255)
Bremszeit (1-255)

variable.tooltip:
This is the decoder product family identifier.
69 = SoundCar
variable.label: Manufacturer Version ID
Versione Decoder:
Version décodeur:
Decoder Version:

variable.tooltip: 141 = SoundTraxx
variable.label: Manufacturer ID
ID Costruttore:
ID constructeur:
Hersteller ID:

variable.tooltip:
Sets the time period that is allowed to elapse between receipts of a valid packet
addressed to the decoder before a throttle shutdown occurs. Enter zero to disable.
variable.label: Packet Time Out Value (0-255)
Time-out ricezione (0-255)

variable.tooltip:
Defines the type of power source the decoder should
switch to whenever a DCC signal is not present.
(Tip: Alternate Power Source must be enabled)
variable.label: Power Source Conversion Type
Tipo conversione alimentazione

variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F1 when the unit is operating in analog power mode
variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F1
Stato funzione Analogico - F1

variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F2 when the unit is operating in analog power mode
variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F2
Stato funzione Analogico - F2

variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F3 when the unit is operating in analog power mode
variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F3
Stato funzione Analogico - F3

variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F4 when the unit is operating in analog power mode
variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F4
Stato funzione Analogico - F4

variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F5 when the unit is operating in analog power mode
variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F5
Stato funzione Analogico - F5

variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F6 when the unit is operating in analog power mode
variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F6
Stato funzione Analogico - F6

variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F7 when the unit is operating in analog power mode
variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F7
Stato funzione Analogico - F7

variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F8 when the unit is operating in analog power mode
variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F8
Stato funzione Analogico - F8

variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F0(f) when the unit is operating in analog power mode
variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F0(f)
Stato funzione Analogico - F0 (avanti)

variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F0(r) when the unit is operating in analog power mode
variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F0(r)
Stato funzione Analogico - F0 (retro)

variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F9 when the unit is operating in analog power mode
variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F9
Stato funzione Analogico - F9

variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F10 when the unit is operating in analog power mode
variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F10
Stato funzione Analogico - F10

variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F11 when the unit is operating in analog power mode
variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F11
Stato funzione Analogico - F11

variable.tooltip: Check to enable function F12 when the unit is operating in analog power mode
variable.label: Analog Mode Function Status - F12
Stato funzione Analogico - F12

variable.tooltip:
Enter the Lock ID Code to unlock access to the decoder CVs.
(Tip: Establish the unlock code with CV Lock ID Code)
variable.label: CV Unlock Register (0-7)
CV sblocco registri (0-7)

variable.tooltip: Sets the unlock code that must be entered into the CV Unlock Register in order to access the decoder CVs
variable.label: CV Lock ID Code (0-7)
CV blocco registri (0-7)

variable.comment: Stores consist address. Range 0-127 (direction set in bit 7)
variable.label: Consist Address (0-127)
Indirizzo consist (0-127)
variable.comment: Stores consist address. Range 0-127 (direction set in bit 7)
Memoria per indirizzo Consist. Valori da 0 a 127 (bit direzione in bit 7)
A consist address over 127 will also set this bit
variable.label: Loco Direction In Consist
Direzione consist
variable.comment: A consist address over 127 will also set this bit
n consist con valore > 127 mette ad 1 questo bit

variable.item: Consist Address Active For FL in Forward
variable.label: Consist Address Activation for F0(f) in Forward
Attivazione indirizzo consist per F0(avanti)

variable.item: Consist Address Active For FL in Reverse
variable.label: Consist Address Activation for F0(r) in Reverse
Attivazione indirizzo consist per F0(retro)

variable.tooltip: When loco is in a consist, it's base acceleration rate is modified by this amount
variable.label: Consist Acceleration Rate (0-127)
Accellerazione consist (0-127)

variable.tooltip: When loco is in a consist, it's baseline braking rate is modified by this amount
variable.label: Consist Braking Rate (0-127)
Frenata consist (0-127)

variable.tooltip: Determines whether value is added to or subtracted from loco baseline braking rate
variable.label: Consist Braking Sign
Segno Frenata Consist

variable.tooltip: Enable locking of CVs when decoder is used in a multi-decoder installation
variable.label: CV Lock Enable
Abilitazione CV di Blocco

variable.tooltip: Tip: To do a one-time decoder reset, use the menu [Reset] selection
variable.label: CV Clear (CVCLR)
Abilitazione CV di Cancellazione (CVCLR)

variable.tooltip: Function Group 2 (F5-F8) assignments are swapped with Function Group 3 (F9-F12)
variable.label: Function Group 2 and 3 Exchange
Funzione scambio gruppo 2 e 3

variable.tooltip:
Determines the effect generated from the headlight.
Note: 'Smart Box Flicker' effect not available for this decoder.
variable.label: Headlight F0(f) Effect Selection
Selezione effetti Luci frontali F0 (avanti)

variable.tooltip: Alters the timing of the effect so that it's 180 degrees out of phase with the other effects
variable.label: Headlight F0(f) Phase Selection
Selezione Fase Luci frontali F0 (avanti)

variable.tooltip: Causes the lighting effect to become active only when the horn has been sounded
variable.label: Headlight F0(f) Grade Crossing Logic
Logica Incrocio Luci frontali F0 (avanti)

variable.tooltip:
Converts the headlight and backup light to independent, non-directional lights. Headlight
is controlled as if it were FX5, Function 5 and the backup light as FX6, Function 6.
variable.label: Headlight F0(f) Rule 17 Mode
Regola 17 Luci frontali F0 (avanti)

variable.tooltip: Provides special compensation for lighting effect contrast when using LEDs
variable.label: Headlight F0(f) Light Type
Tipo Luci frontali F0 (avanti)

variable.tooltip:
Determines the effect generated from the backup light.
Note: 'Smart Box Flicker' effect not available for this decoder.
variable.label: Backup Light F0(r) Effect Selection
Selezione effetti Luci posteriori F0 (retro)

variable.tooltip: Alters the timing of the effect so that it's 180 degrees out of phase with the other effects
variable.label: Backup Light F0(r) Phase Selection
Selezione Fase Luci posteriori F0 (retro)

variable.item: Backup Light F0(r) Grade Crossing Logic
variable.tooltip: Causes the lighting effect to become active only when the horn has been sounded
variable.label: Backup Light F0(r) Grade Crossing Logic
Logica Incrocio Luci posteriori F0 (retro)

variable.tooltip:
Converts the headlight and backup light to independent, non-directional lights. Headlight
is controlled as if it were FX5, Function 5 and the backup light as FX6, Function 6.
variable.label: Backup Light F0(r) Rule 17 Mode
Regola 17 Luci posteriori F0 (retro)

variable.tooltip: Provides special compensation for lighting effect contrast when using LEDs
variable.label: Backup Light F0(r) Light Type
Tipo Luci posteriori F0 (retro)

variable.tooltip:
Determines the effect generated from the FX5 light output.
Note: 'Smart Box Flicker' effect not available for this decoder.
variable.label: FX5 Effect Selection
Selezione effetti FX5

variable.tooltip: Alters the timing of the effect so that it's 180 degrees out of phase with the other effects
variable.label: FX5 Phase Selection
Selezione Fase FX5

variable.tooltip: Causes the lighting effect to become active only when the horn has been sounded
variable.label: FX5 Grade Crossing Logic
Logica Incrocio FX5

variable.tooltip:
Converts the headlight and backup light to independent, non-directional lights. Headlight
is controlled as if it were FX5, Function 5 and the backup light as FX6, Function 6.
variable.label: FX5 Rule 17 Mode
Regola 17 FX5

variable.tooltip: Provides special compensation for lighting effect contrast when using LEDs
variable.label: FX5 Light Type
Selezione tipo luce FX5

variable.tooltip:
Determines the effect generated from the FX6 light output.
Note: 'Smart Box Flicker' effect not available for this decoder.
variable.label: FX6 Effect Selection
Selezione effetti luce FX5

variable.tooltip: Alters the timing of the effect so that it's 180 degrees out of phase with the other effects
variable.label: FX6 Phase Selection
Selezione Fase FX5

variable.tooltip: Causes the lighting effect to become active only when the horn has been sounded
variable.label: FX6 Grade Crossing Logic
Logica Incrocio FX6

variable.tooltip:
Converts the headlight and backup light to independent, non-directional lights. Headlight
is controlled as if it were FX5, Function 5 and the backup light as FX6, Function 6.
variable.label: FX6 Rule 17 Mode
Regola 17 FX6

variable.tooltip: Provides special compensation for lighting effect contrast when using LEDs
variable.label: FX6 Light Type
Selezione tipo luce FX6

variable.tooltip: Check to enable FX5 function output in Forward direction
variable.label: FX5 Forward Directional Control
Controllo direzionale luce anteriori FX5

variable.tooltip: Check to enable FX5 function output in Reverse direction
variable.label: FX5 Reverse Directional Control
Controllo direzionale luce posteriori FX5

variable.tooltip: Check to enable FX6 function output in Forward direction
variable.label: FX6 Forward Directional Control
Controllo direzionale luce anteriori FX6

variable.tooltip: Check to enable FX6 function output in Reverse direction
variable.label: FX6 Reverse Directional Control
Controllo direzionale luce posteriori FX6

variable.tooltip: When enabled, turning on FX5 will turn off all other lighting function outputs
variable.label: FX5 Lighting Override
Override Luci con FX5

variable.tooltip: When enabled, turning on FX6 will turn off all other lighting function outputs
variable.label: FX6 Lighting Override
Override Luci con FX6

variable.tooltip: Sets the overall flash rate of the Hyperlight effects (0 is fast, 15 is slow)
variable.label: Hyperlight Flash Rate (0-15)
Luci Lampeggianti Hyperlight con FX5
variable.comment: 0 is fast, 15 is slow, 4 is recommended for start

variable.tooltip: Sets the time (in seconds) an effect will stay on after the horn button is released
variable.label: Grade Crossing Hold Time (0-15)
Temporizzazione Incrocio (0-15)

variable.tooltip: When F11 is pressed, locos baseline braking rate is modified by this amount
variable.label: F11 Braking Rate (0-127)
F11 Forza Frenata (0-127)
variable.comment: Additional braking when Fll activated (combined with CV4)
Frenata addizionage quando F11 premuto (combinata con CV4)

variable.tooltip: Determines whether value is added to or subtracted from loco baseline braking rate
variable.label: F11 Braking Sign
F11 Segno Frenata

variable.tooltip:
Sets the voltage difference between when the decoder first powers up and when the locomotive starts to move.
Note: used for synchronizing the clickety clack, flat spot, wheel noise and flange squeal sound effects
variable.label: Analog Mode Motor Start Voltage (0-255)

variable.tooltip:
Sets the maximum average voltage applied to the motor when operating in analog mode.
Note: used for synchronizing the clickety clack, flat spot, wheel noise and flange squeal sound effects
variable.label: Analog Mode Max Motor Voltage (0-255)

variable.tooltip:
Allows the decoders overall throttle response in the forward direction to be adjusted up or down.
Values 1-127 will decrease motor voltage, 129-255 will increase it. A value of zero will disable.
Tip: this feature only active when speed tables are enabled.
variable.label: Forward Trim (0-255)

variable.tooltip:
Allows the decoders overall throttle response in the reverse direction to be adjusted up or down.
Values 1-127 will decrease motor voltage, 129-255 will increase it. A value of zero will disable.
Tip: this feature only active when speed tables are enabled.
variable.label: Reverse Trim (0-255)

enumChoice.choice: Sound effect controlled by Function key
Sound effect controlled by Function key
Effetto suono controllato da tasto Funzione

variable.label: Generator Control
Controllo Generatore
variable.tooltip:
The generator can either be automatic or controlled with a function key (default F9).
When the automatic generator is enabled, the function key is ignored.
Sets the number of axles per truck used to determine the clickety-clack rate
variable.label: Axles per Truck
Assi per Carrello

variable.tooltip: Sets the number of trucks per car used to determine the clickety-clack rate
variable.label: Trucks per Car
Carrelli per carro

variable.tooltip:
When loco has stopped and all functions are turned off, sound effects will turn
off automatically after timeout period has elapsed. Set to zero to disable.
variable.label: Quiet Mode Timeout Period
Temporizzazione modo silenzioso

variable.tooltip: Controls the speed at which the bell rings (higher no. = slower rate
variable.label: Bell Ring Rate
Frequenza Campana

variable.tooltip: Selects which airhorn to use
variable.label: Airhorn Select
Selezione Tromba aria compressa

variable.tooltip: Selects which airhorn to use
variable.label: Airhorn Select
Selezione Tromba aria compressa

variable.tooltip:
Used to set the proportionality between the speed step and the scale speed in feet per second (ft/s)
Used to determine the frequency of the clickety-clack and flat spot sound effects
based on the scale speed of the car and distance between rail joints.
A value of 1 corresponds to 0.01ft/s. Higher values correspond to faster scale speeds.
Entering a value of 0 will disable the clickety-clack and flat spot sound effects altogether
variable.label: Moving Sound Scalar
Suono scalare movimento

variable.tooltip:
Adjust the motor response following a momentary power glitch
0 or 128 = Disabled
1-127 = Absolute Limiting (will return to this speed step)
129-255 = Proportional Limiting (a percentage of set speed)
Note: used for synchronizing the clickety clack, flat spot, wheel noise and flange squeal sound effects
variable.label: Motor Recovery Speed (0-255)
Velocità ripristino motore (0-255)

variable.tooltip: Sets the overall volume of all sound channels
variable.label: Master Volume Control
Controllo Volume generale

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the airhorn/whistle
variable.label: Airhorn Volume
Volume Tromba

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the bell
variable.label: Bell Volume
Volume Campana

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the clickety-clack effect
variable.label: Clickety-clack Volume
Volume Click-Clack

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the generator
variable.label: Generator Volume
Volume Generatore

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the flange squeal
variable.label: Flange Squeal Volume
Volume Stridio Flange

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the flat stop effect
variable.label: Flat Spot Volume
Volume tratto in piano

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the wheel noise
variable.label: Wheel Noise Volume
Volume rumore ruote

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the couplers uncoupling
variable.label: Uncoupling Volume
Volume Sgancio

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the couplers coupling
variable.label: Coupler Volume
Volume Gancio

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the brakes setting
variable.label: Brake Set Volume
Volume attivazione freni

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the brakes squealing
variable.label: Brake Squeal Volume
Volume Stridio Freni

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the retainer valve releasing
variable.label: Retainer Valve Volume
Volume Valvola ritenuta

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the emergency brake valve releasing
variable.label: Emergency Brake Valve Volume
Volume Valvola freni di emergenza

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the hand brake setting
variable.label: Hand Brake Set Volume
Volume Attivazione Freno a mano

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the hand brake releasing
variable.label: Hand Brake Release Volume
Volume Rilascio Freno a mano

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the livestock
variable.label: Livestock Volume
Volume Livestock

variable.tooltip: Specifies the throttle speed step where the automatic bell will first turn on
variable.label: Bell-On Set Point
Punto di intervento Campana

variable.tooltip: Specifies the throttle speed step where the automatic bell will turn off
variable.label: Bell-Off Set Point
Punto di silenzio Campana

variable.tooltip: Specifies the positive rate of throttle change needed to activate the automatic grade crossing horn
variable.label: Grade Crossing Airhorn Sensitivity
Sensibilità Tromba ad Incrocio

variable.item: Automatic Grade Crossing Horn Enable (Analog Mode)
variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Grade Crossing Horn in Analog Mode
variable.label: Automatic Grade Crossing Horn Enable (Analog Mode)
Abilitazione Automatica Tromba ad Incrocio (in Analogico)

variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Horn Signal in Analog Mode
variable.label: Automatic Horn Signal Enable (Analog Mode)
Abilitazione Automatica Tromba (in Analogico)

variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Bell in Analog Mode
variable.label: Automatic Bell Enable (Analog Mode)
Abilitazione Automatica Campana (in Analogico)

variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Grade Crossing Horn in Digital Mode
variable.label: Automatic Grade Crossing Horn Enable
Abilitazione Automatica Tromba in Incrocio

variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Horn Signal in Digital Mode
variable.label: Automatic Horn Signal Enable
Abilitazione Automatica Tromba

variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Bell in Digital Mode
variable.label: Automatic Bell Enable
Abilitazione Automatica Campana

variable.tooltip:
Sets the frequency of occurrence for the flange squeal sound effect.
- 0 = Infinite time between flange squeals (never squeals).
- 255 = Constant flange squeal.
variable.label: Flange Squeal Probability
Probabilità Stridio Flange

variable.tooltip:
Sets the frequency of occurrence for the generator sound effect.
- 0 = Generator never turns on.
- 255 = Generator runs constantly.
variable.label: Generator Probability
Probabilità suono Generatore

variable.tooltip:
Sets the frequency of occurrence for the livestock sound effect.
- 0 = Lowest level of anxiety.
- 255 = Highest level of anxiety.
variable.label: Livestock Probability
Probabilità suono Livestock

variable.tooltip: Livestock Select option
variable.label: Livestock Select

variable.tooltip: Selects which bell to use
variable.label: Bell Select
Selezione campana

variable.tooltip: Selects which bell to use
variable.label: Bell Select
Selezione campana

variable.tooltip:
Sets the function key assignment to activate Intelligent Consisting once the car has entered
into ‘waiting mode’ for a signal from the command station to add it to the consist.
variable.label: Intelligent Consist Fct. Output Loc.
Funzione Consist Intelligente

factReset.label: Reset all CVs to factory defaults
Reset di tutte le CV ai valori di fabbrica
